meanings.definition: Inciting or causing people to rebel against authority.
meanings.sent1: The seditiousness behavior of the group led to chaos in the city.
meanings.sent2: The government was concerned about the seditiousness activities of the protesters.
meanings.sent3: The seditiousness remarks of the troublemaker were not taken lightly.
meanings.sent4: Her seditiousness nature made her a controversial figure in the community.
meanings.sent5: The seditiousness actions of the rebels were met with swift punishment.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being seditious.
meanings.sent1: The seditiousness of the speech sparked unrest among the citizens.
meanings.sent2: Authorities were on high alert due to the seditiousness of the group.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about the seditiousness of the fictional characters in his skit.
meanings.sent4: The seditiousness of the situation was palpable in the air.
meanings.sent5: The seditiousness of the plot added an intense layer to the novel.
